text: Josef "Pepi" Bader (29 May 1941 - 30 October 2021) was a West German bobsledder. He competed in two Winter Olympics, he won silver medals in the two-man event both in 1968 and 1972. Bader also won two medals at the 1970 FIBT World Championships in St. Moritz. He was born in Grainau, Germany. Bader died on 30 October 2021, aged 80.Pepi Bader passes away at the age of 80 ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for Germany Category:German bobsledders Category:Sportspeople from Bavaria
title: Pepi Bader
